config.question: Which of the following individuals can best be described as a guest worker?

choices.content: Kibwe works in a bottling factory, making the equivalent of $0.20 an hour. He is in debt to his employer, who provides food and housing at a steep price.
Jelena was promised a housekeeping job in the United States, but when she arrived, her host put her to work as a prostitute. She speaks little English and does not know how to escape her situation.
Sarish works for the al-Quari family, a group of wealthy landowners in Sudan. She cannot remember a time before she worked for the family and does not plan to ever leave.
Ranj works as a construction worker in Abu Dhabi. Every month he sends part of his paycheck home to his wife and children in Pakistan.
